channel.title: Error Batch File?
channel.description:
I know it says do not ask this question but i can not figure it out and personally if some1 would just work with me it would be alot better thanks
'JAVA' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. Press any key to continue . .
Also people can not connect to my server i put in the ip 127.0.0.1 but no1 can connect help me? Only person who can connect is ME Help me were i can get other people to connect?

item.title: Error Batch File?
item.dc:creator: @Mod.Ash Mod.Ash
item.description:
@Mod.Ash wrote:

When i sign on i can only use 127.0.0.1 but i need to use 0.0.0.0
but it wont work help! please[br][size=1]Posted on: March 02, 2007, 05:38:45 PM[/size][hr]Need some profesianol help here :o

Read full topic

item.title: Error Batch File?
item.dc:creator: @domo9122 domo9122
item.description:
@domo9122 wrote:

It is the java you have it is not the same that is put in the code…right click on compile and click edit…you will see a java name match that up with yours or check out my site has help on there

Read full topic

item.title: Error Batch File?
item.dc:creator: @Mod.Ash Mod.Ash
item.description:
@Mod.Ash wrote:

Ya thats basicly it so how do i get people to connect to mine??
because i have editeded it alot and i really need help on this one[br][size=1]Posted on: February 24, 2007, 10:12:15 PM[/size][hr]thanks anyways guys and girls[br][size=1]Posted on: February 24, 2007, 10:49:58 PM[/size][hr]STill accepting help[br][size=1]Posted on: February 25, 2007, 09:27:23 AM[/size][hr]Makin mod on server for help im desperate

item.title: Error Batch File?
item.dc:creator: @Agent766 Agent766
item.description:
@Agent766 wrote:

You need JDK 6.0. Also 127.0.0.1 is a local host. Basically it connects to a looper that sends it back to their own computer. Since you’re runing your game it works for you. With your friends it connects to their computer so it doesn’t connect to their game. Got it?

Read full topic

item.description:
@haha_w_e wrote:

with the ip 127.00.0 right? thats not the ip… you either need a no.ip or download a hamachi at: http://www.hamachi.cc/download/ then at the top of you hamachi is your ip.
